item.title: 盎格鲁集团的跌跌撞撞使其成为矿业最大掠食者的猎物
item.description: 2022 年 4 月中旬，前老板马克-库蒂法尼（Mark Cutifani）离开英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）时，这家拥有百年历史的老牌矿商的境况好得出奇。随着全球摆脱封锁，金属价格飙升，公司最近公布了有史以来最好的年度利润，而这位广受欢迎的行业资深人士正将工作移交给一位值得信赖的副手。当天，盎格鲁集团的股价创下历史新高。【原文：When former boss Mark Cutifani left Anglo American Plc in mid-April 2022, things had rarely looked better for the century-old miner. Metals prices soared as the world emerged from lockdowns, the company had recently posted its best-ever annual profit and the popular industry veteran was handing over to a trusted lieutenant. Anglo stock hit a record the same day.】
